headline: Why The Narrative Around Cboe Global Markets (CBOE) Is Shifting After Fresh Guidance And Fees Data
summary: Why Cboe’s Fair Value Moved, Even As Growth Assumptions Softened Cboe Global Markets has seen its fair value estimate inch from about US$262.08 to about US$267.77 per share, while the discount rate used in the model has shifted only slightly from about 8.24% to about 8.23%. This small uplift in fair value, despite a long term revenue growth assumption that now bakes in a 16.60% decline rather than a 16.07% decline, reflects how recent record results and raised 2025 guidance are balancing...
